entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Shilo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 42 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
